name: Tempest Inc.
description:
Tempest Inc. is about a group of best friends taking on an evil force using their unique abilities!

NOTE! This game requires a controller to play! Xbox One and Xbox Series controllers are supported, and will only show button prompts for such. Nintendo Switch and Dualshock 4 controllers should be supported but these HAVE NOT BEEN TESTED.

Please fill out the playtest survey and help me make this game great!
https://forms.gle/pQdsTCXNmMqadCsXA

CONTROLS (Xbox controls shown)
Left Analog Stick - Movement
A  - Fire - Confirm
X / Left Bumper - Character Ability 1
B / Right Bumper - Character Ability 2
D-Pad - Change Characters

You can press Escape to quit the game at any time.
